title: dEvi nin
sahitya:
dEvi nin vaDivazhagaip-parugi mahA  dEvan mati mayanginAn tripurasundari


anupallavi

  mUvulagum tozhum mukkaNNan unaip-pirindE
mullai naghai mukham kANAdEnginAn umA


caraNam    veTruDal tAngavE shaktiyillAmal engum verikoNDu pittAgi
 shuTri alaindE kuTramil manmatan mEl erindu vIzhndAn undan
 kurunaghai kaNDanrO shinandaNindAn gaurI
